mutants.code:
def find_min_minutes_to_make_cross(n, m, picture):
    ans = float('')
    l = [row.count('.') for row in picture]
    df2 = list(map(list, zip(*picture)))
    w = [col.count('.') for col in df2]
    for i in range(n):
        ans1 = l[i]
        x = w.copy()
        for j in range(m):
            if picture[i][j] == '.':
                x[j] -= 1
        ans2 = min(x)
        ans = min(ans, ans1 + ans2)
    return ans

def find_min_minutes_to_make_cross(n, m, picture):
    ans = float('inf')

def find_min_minutes_to_make_cross(n, m, picture):
    ans = float('inf')
    l = [row.count('.') for row in picture]
    df2 = list(map(list, zip(*picture)))
    w = [col.count('.') for col in df2]
    for i in range(n):
        ans1 = l[i]
        x = w.copy()
        for j in range(m):
            if picture[i][j] == '.':
                x[j] -= -1
        ans2 = min(x)
        ans = min(ans, ans1 + ans2)
    return ans
